nodes.caption: INFORMATION 1. Accurate information on sexuality and RH 2. Importance of SRH information to adolescents
MOTIVATION 1. Perceived risk of adolescent to encounter RHP. 2. Social norms regarding communicating with adolescents on sexuality and SRH 3. Attitude towards communicating with adolescents on SRH
BEHAVIORAL SKILLS 1. Self efficacy on communicating with adolescents on SRH. 2. Objective skills in Communicating with adolescents about SRH.
CARETAKERS' BEHAVIOR OF COMMUNICATING WITH ADOLESCENTS 1. Frequency with which caretaker communicate with adolescents on SRH 2. Number of topics of SRH communicated
